001package game;
002import java.lang.reflect.Array;
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Random;
005
006
007
008public class TransporterRoom extends Room {
009    private ArrayList<Room> aPossibleRooms;
010    private Room aChosenRoom;
011
012    /**
013     * Initialization of a transporter room
014     * @param pDescription Room's description
015     * @param pImage An image used to show the room
016     */
017    public TransporterRoom(String pDescription,final String pImage, final String pRoomName) {
018        super(pDescription,pImage,pRoomName);
019        this.aPossibleRooms = new ArrayList<Room>();
020        this.aChosenRoom = null;
021    }
022
023    /**
024     * Sets the possible destination rooms
025     * @param pRooms The list of possible rooms
026     */
027    public void setDestinations(ArrayList<Room> pRooms) {
028        this.aPossibleRooms = pRooms;
029    }
030
031    /**
032     * Gives the room's exit in the given direction.
033     * @return The chosen room.
034     */
035    public Room getChosenRoom() {
036        return this.aChosenRoom;
037    }
038
039
040    /**
041     * Sets the chosen room according to the random number
042     * @param pRngNumber The random number
043     */
044    public void setChosenRoom(final int pRngNumber){
045        this.aChosenRoom = this.aPossibleRooms.get(pRngNumber);
046    }
047
048    /**
049     * Gives the room's exit in the given direction.
050     * @return The chosen room.
051     */
052    public int getRngNumber(){
053        Random vRandom = new Random();
054        return vRandom.nextInt(this.aPossibleRooms.size());
055    }
056
057}
